name: The Greatest Detective
description: Prepare for the most underwhelming visual novel you will play in your life! Step into the shoes of Ben Hayes, an average young man who, through misfortunate, coincidence and sheer idiocy, decides to become the greatest detective known to man! For his first job, he resolves to take on the most prolific thief in the world, Johnathan Barker. Can Ben succeed where many, many other detectives have failed? Well... probably not, but he's definitely going to try.
